name: Quibo
description:
Play as Quibo, a lizard with the heart of an adventurer
Quibo wishes to see what is beyond his island home, but the only way out is through a door locked by three gems
Help Quibo collect three gems so he can find fulfill his dream!

Made by Team Confirmed at Media Design School Prototype 3 - Year 3

Programmers:
James Monk
Sally Gillbanks

Artists:
Max Bainbridge
Zane Bronnimann
Ryan Coates
Janelle Ducker
